humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there were 3 sentinel lymph nodes excised and all were negative for malignancy on routine and immunohistochemical stains (specimen A and B). The final diagnosis also states 'pNO (sn)', which indicates no regional lymph node metastasis. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that sentinel lymph nodes #1, #2, and #3 were all negative for malignancy on both routine and immunohistochemical stains (specimen A and B). Therefore, the patient's N stage is N0, as there is no evidence of cancer in the regional lymph nodes.
